statistics.withEachCustomerOrder: With each customer order, the inventory of menu items is automatically reduced
statistics.uponOrderPlacement: Upon order placement, the quantities of raw materials consumed for that product are automatically deducted.
statistics.noMoreNeedForManualAccounting: No more need for manual accounting and inventory counting
statistics.instantAccessToSalesReports: Instant access to sales reports, most popular items, and sales trends
statistics.noNeedForSeparateAccountingSystem: No need for a separate accounting system anymore! Miznex intelligently manages your inventory and raw materials.
statistics.thePizzaInventorySystem: The pizza inventory system reduces by 1 unit
statistics.rawMaterialsWillAlsoDecrease: Dough, cheese, meat, and other raw materials will also decrease

faq.doesMiznexMenuWork: Does the Miznex menu work on all phones?
faq.yesOurMenusAreFullyResponsive: Yes. Our menus are fully responsive and display perfectly on all Android and iOS devices as well as desktops.
faq.isCodingRequiredToUse: Is coding required to use Miznex?
faq.noPanelIsDesignedToBeCompletelyVisual: No, not at all! Our user panel is designed to be completely visual (Drag & Drop) so that anyone can build their menu in less than a few minutes
faq.ifWeUpdateMenu: If we update the menu, will the QR code change?
faq.dedicatedQRCodeIsPermanentAndNeverChange: No. Your dedicated QR code is permanent and never changes. All your menu changes are automatically applied under the same QR code.
faq.everythingYouNeedToKnow: Everything you need to know about Miznex
faq.ifPricesChangeDaily: If prices change daily, can the management panel respond quickly?
faq.ourSystemIsDesignedToBeDynamic: Our system is designed to be dynamic. You can update prices in a split second. This capability is the most vital tool for restaurants that have real-time pricing.

footer.intelligentPlatform: An intelligent platform for creating digital menus for restaurants and cafes with inventory management and advanced analytics features.

description.desc1: Place the QR code on tables, boards, or special cards so customers can easily scan it with their mobile phones.
description.desc2: Customers open their phone camera and scan the QR code, which automatically directs them to the digital menu.
description.desc3: Update your menu anytime in the app, and the changes will instantly be reflected in the digital menu and QR code.
description.desc4: This link is used to share your caf√© menu on social media.
description.desc5: View QR scan and menu visit reports here to understand which menu or branch is used more.
